column3:
気を付けて！ 
あれはガノンが造った魔物……
100年前私は あいつに……
column4:
Please take care.That...thing is one of Ganon's creations.I put up as much of a fight as I could, but it
proved to be my demise 100 years ago...

column3:
でも……
貴方なら勝てる……
きっと勝てる！
column4:
Regardless...I believe that you are well prepared
for this moment.I have faith in you!
